entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
